sourcesContent:
import React,{ useState, useEffect} from "react"; import { Container, Grid ,CardMedia, Typography,TextField, Button,Select,FormControl,MenuItem} from "@material-ui/core"; import logoicon from '../logoicon.jpeg'; import TableDemand from './components/tableDemand'; import { saveClientServer , getClientById , getRUC} from "../../services/api/ClientService"; import { saveRequestDocument , GetRequestsDocumentById} from "../../services/api/Demandservice"; import { getCompanyById} from "../../services/api/CompanyService"; const Demand = (props) =>{ const { match} = props; const demandid = match.params.demandid; const [ demandModel , setDemandModel ] = useState({ RequestId : 0, Applicationseries : '', ClientID : 5, Contact : '', Correlative : '', CustomerAddress : '', Dateofissue : '', IdCategory : 0, IdPriority : 0, Phone : '', Reason: '', Responsible: '', ScheduledDate: '', Adviser :'', RequestDeatils : [] }); const [ clientModel , setClientModel ] = useState({ ClientID : 0, CustomerName : '', CustomerAddress: '', RUCClient : '', Active : true }); const [ demandDetailModel , setDemandDetailModel] = useState({ LineRequestDetail:'0', Mark:'0', MediumRequestDetail : '0', Model:'0', NumberRequestDetail:1, Place:'0', ServiceRequestDetail : '0', RequestId:0 }); const [ companyModel, setCompanyModel] = useState({ address : '', branch : '', idCompany : 0, phone : '', ruc:'', socialReason : '', tradeName : '' }); useEffect(() => { if (demandid != null) { GetRequestsDocumentById(demandid).then(response =>{ console.log(response.data); const { data } = response; setDemandModel((last)=>({ ...last, IdCategory : data.idCategory, Adviser : data.adviser, Applicationseries : data.applicationseries, Dateofissue : data.dateofissue, IdPriority : data.idPriority, ScheduledDate : data.scheduledDate, Reason : data.reason, Responsible : data.responsible, Contact: data.contact, Phone : data.phone, })); setDemandDetailModel({ LineRequestDetail : data.requestDeatils.lineRequestDetail, Mark : data.requestDeatils.mark, MediumRequestDetail : data.requestDeatils.mediumRequestDetail, Model: data.requestDeatils.model, NumberRequestDetail:1, Place: data.requestDeatils.place, ServiceRequestDetail : data.requestDeatils.serviceRequestDetail, RequestId:data.requestId }) getClientById(data.clientID).then(response =>{ const { data } = response; console.log(response.data); setClientModel((last)=>({ ...last, ClientID : data.clientID, CustomerName: data.customerName, CustomerAddress : data.customerAddress, RUCClient : data.rucClient })); }); }) } getCompanyById(1).then(response =>{ console.log(response.data); setCompanyModel(response.data); }) }, [demandid]) const saveDemand = (e) =>{ const { name, value} = e.target; setDemandModel(last => ({ ...last, [name]: value })) } const saveClient = (e) =>{ const { name, value} = e.target; setClientModel(last => ({ ...last, [name]: value })) } const sendClient = () => { saveClientServer(clientModel).then(response => { const { data } = response; var clientId = data; setClientModel(last => ({ ...last, ClientID: clientId })) saveRequestDocument(demandModel, demandDetailModel).then(response =>{ console.log(response); }); }); } return( {companyModel.tradeName} {companyModel.address} TELEFONO: {companyModel.phone} CEL: 991463701 / 980658053 EMAIL : gerencia@biossay.com.pe RUC {companyModel.ruc} SOLICITUD DE SERVICIO 0001-0001 RUC F. Emisin Cliente Prioridad Direccin Responsable Categora F. Programada
Asesor Comercial Motivo Contacto Telfono ); } export default Demand;
